ProjectInformation.property: Library project template with all possible element types, docu and a sample project structure

documentation.xhtml: * Function Block allows to control drive power stage and quick stop option. * By setting bRegulatorON - power stage is enabled * By setting bDriveStart - quick stop option is being disabled
Stopping : BOOL; Nie w falowniku (chyba, że da się jakoś inaczej -> zobaczyć statusword)

ST.xhtml: ReadSDO( xExecute:= Execute, usiCom:= Com, uiDevice:= Device, usiChannel:= 1, wIndex:= Index, bySubindex:= Subindex, udiTimeOut:= 100, pBuffer:= ADR(SDOData), szSize:= SIZEOF(SDOData), xDone=> , xBusy=> , xError=> , eError=> ErrorID, udiSdoAbort=> , szDataRead=> );
